IRON_OSSETIAN{IE.IRANIAN|Indo-European,Indo-Iranian,Iranian,Eastern,Northeastern}
 1   43.00   44.00      526453   oss   oss
1 I	EZ // Cyrillic s, z are pronounced as S, Z and c, dz as s, z in the modern literary language.
2 you	d3 //
3 we	maX //
11 one	iu, yu //
12 two	d3wE //
18 person	%adEmag, udgomag // loan from Arabic
19 fish	kESag, kEf //
21 dog	kw~3z // kw is labialised k is Ossetic (Cyrillic orthography does not distinguish between /u/ and /w/ but they are different)
22 louse	S3St //
23 tree	bElaS //
25 leaf	S3f // not sure where t"afE came from, it is present neither in Abaev's dictionary nor in the most recent edition (Vladikavkaz 2004)
28 skin	sarm // m3Skw~3 is kind of animal skin, probably not relevant
30 blood	tug //
31 bone	StEg //
34 horn	S3k"a // again, S3 is 3rd person plural clitic, no such word for 'horn' in the dictionaries
39 ear	quS //
40 eye	sESt //
41 nose	f3nz //
43 tooth	dEndag //
44 tongue	EvZag //
47 knee	wErag, Zon3g //
48 hand	k"uX, arm // arm is, well 'arm' and not exactly 'hand'
51 breast	riw, riu //
53 liver	igEr //
54 drink	nwaZ, s3m //
57 see	w3n //
58 hear	quS //
61 die	mEl //
66 come	sEw //
72 sun	Xur //
74 star	St"al3 //
75 water	don //
77 stone	dur //
82 fire	Z3ng, art // no velar nasal
85 path	fEndag //
86 mountain	XoX //
92 night	EXSEv //
95 full	zag //
96 new	nEwEg, nog //
100 name	nom //
